job_title: Anonymous Employee in New York, NY
pros: It is filled with some good workers, and some your protected by your union.
cons: If you have plans to grow into management, and your not a particular race/not wiling to flirt with everyone like your higher ups do you won't be able to grow into this facility. You can work to the point where you don't see your family, and you will only hear "who told you to do that" or "thats what your suppose to do", while under qualified people are rewarder/promoted solely because of favoritism and race.

pros: working time is flexible, low pressure
cons: research scientist is basically another name of postdoc. the salary is slightly above the NIH standard but it is still very low since it is in New York City.

job_title: Administrative Assistant in New York, NY

cons: No opportunity for growth. Even though you are "protected by the union," there really isn't much protection, when they want to fire you they will find a way.
